ADBE Additive Dissolve: A bright, glowing fade that adds the color intensity of both clips together, creating a dreamy or washed-out light effect.
ADBE Band Slide: Reveals the incoming clip using sliding rectangular bands, creating a geometric and structured transition.
ADBE Band Wipe: Wipes between clips using moving bars, offering a structured, blinds-like reveal.
ADBE CheckerBoard: Reveals the next clip through a grid of alternating squares, creating a retro or puzzle-like pattern.
ADBE Checker Wipe: A wipe effect using a moving grid of checkerboard squares.
ADBE Cross Zoom: A high-speed zoom into the first clip and out of the second, creating a fast, energetic, and seamless warp effect.
ADBE Film Dissolve: A classic, realistic fade that blends clips in a linear color space, mimicking the optical dissolve of actual film.
ADBE Iris Cross: A transition where the new clip appears inside a cross shape that expands outward.
ADBE Iris Diamond: A transition where the new clip is revealed through an expanding diamond shape.
ADBE Iris Round: A classic circle opening transition, reminiscent of silent films or cartoons.
ADBE Iris Square: A transition where the new clip is revealed through an expanding square box.
ADBE Page Turn: Simulates a physical page peeling from the corner to reveal the next clip, evoking a storybook or chapter change.
ADBE Paint Splatter: Reveals the next clip through an organic, ink-blot or paint-splatter shaped matte.
ADBE Pinwheel: Wipes between clips using rotating triangular sections, resembling a spinning pinwheel.
ADBE Push: The incoming clip physically pushes the outgoing clip off-screen, indicating directional travel or temporal progression.
ADBE Random Blocks: Reveals the new clip through a randomized grid of disappearing blocks, creating a digitized or pixelated effect.
ADBE Random Wipe: A wipe that reveals the new clip using a randomized, noisy pattern.
ADBE Slide: The incoming clip slides over the top of the outgoing clip, like a physical photo being placed on top.
ADBE Spiral Boxes: A complex geometric wipe where boxes spiral inward or outward to reveal the new image.
ADBE Venetian Blinds: Simulates opening blinds with horizontal or vertical slats to reveal the underlying clip.
ADBE Wedge Wipe: Wipes the screen using a rotating wedge shape, similar to a clock hand or radar sweep.
ADBE Wipe: A simple, hard-edged line travels across the screen to replace one clip with another.
ADBE Zig-Zag Blocks: Reveals the image in a stepped, diagonal zig-zag pattern.
AE.Mettle SkyBox Chroma Leaks: Overlays colorful, spectrum-based light leaks, creating a psychedelic or holographic vibe.
AE.Mettle SkyBox Light Leaks: Simulates organic light entering a camera lens, adding warmth, vintage flair, or a dreamy atmosphere.
AE.Mettle SkyBox Random Blocks: A VR-optimized transition that swaps scenes using randomized blocky patterns.
AE.ADBE MorphCut: An AI-powered transition that blends face movements to hide jump cuts in interviews, making the edit appear continuous.
AE.Mettle SkyBox Rays: Projects volumetric light rays from the bright parts of the image to transition between scenes.
AE.Mettle SkyBox Gradient Wipe: Uses a softness gradient to melt one scene into another, often used for 360 or immersive footage.
AE.Mettle SkyBox Mobius Zoom: A trippy, twisting zoom effect that folds the image in on itself.
AE.Mettle SkyBox Iris Wipe: A circular reveal optimized for spherical or 360-degree footage.
AE.Mettle SkyBox Radial Blur: Applies a heavy circular blur to mask the cut, adding rotational energy.
AE.ADBE Dip To Black: Fades the first clip to complete black before fading in the second, signifying a scene change, passage of time, or finality.
AE.ADBE Non-Additive Dissolve: A dissolve that maps luminance values to prevent brightness spikes, resulting in a darker, subtler blend than a standard dissolve.
AE.ADBE Split: The screen splits in half (horizontally or vertically) to reveal the next clip underneath.
AE.ADBE Barn Doors: Simulates two doors opening or closing from the center, revealing the new clip.
AE.ADBE Dip To White: Fades the clip to pure white before revealing the next, creating a flashbulb effect, dream sequence start, or high-key transition.
AE.ADBE Inset: The new clip enters as a smaller picture-in-picture box and zooms to full screen.
AE.ADBE Whip: A fast, directional blur simulating a camera whipping quickly to the side, useful for high-energy action edits.
AE.ADBE Cross Dissolve New: The standard video transition; a smooth, gradual blend from one clip to the next.
AE.ADBE Radial Wipe: A wipe that rotates around a center point, like a clock hand sweeping the screen.
AE.ADBE Center Split: The image divides from the center and moves outwards to reveal the incoming footage.
AE.ADBE Clock Wipe: A circular wipe that moves in a clockwise direction, strongly signifying the passage of time.
AE.AE_Impact_3D_Blinds: A 3D effect where the image rotates like vertical blinds to show the B-side.
AE.AE_Impact_3D_Block: The video breaks into 3D blocks that rotate or tumble to reveal the next shot.
AE.AE_Impact_3D_Flip: The entire frame flips on a 3D axis like a card turning over.
AE.AE_Impact_3D_Roll: The footage rolls off the screen like a rolling pin or cylindrical scroll.
AE.AE_Impact_3D_Rotate: The screen spins on a 3D axis, adding depth and perspective to the cut.
AE.Impact_Additive_Dissolve: A boosted version of the additive dissolve with more control over the glow and brightness intensity.
AE.AE_Impact_Blur_dissolve: Combines a fade with a blur, softening the image details during the transition for a dreamy or foggy look.
AE.AE_Impact_Burn_Alpha: Burns through the alpha channel, eroding the image like acid or fire.
AE.AE_Impact_Burn_White: Simulates a film strip burning up due to heat, transitioning with a bright, organic white-hot edge.
AE.AE_Impact_C-Push: A chromatic aberration push, where color channels split (RGB split) during the movement for a modern, edgy look.
AE.AE_Impact_Chaos: Rapid, frantic displacement and glitching, perfect for horror, tension, or disorienting effects.
AE.AE_Impact_Chroma_Leaks: A stylized light leak that emphasizes RGB color separation and spectrum artifacts.
AE.AE_Impact_Clock_Wipe: A polished version of the standard clock wipe with added smoothing and edge controls.
AE.AE_Impact_Dissolve: A highly customizable cross-dissolve with options for easing and curve adjustments.
AE.Impact_Cross_Zoom: A dynamic zoom-blur transition that propels the viewer into the next scene with high velocity.
AE.AE_Impact_Dip_To_Black: A customizable fade-to-black with control over the curve, allowing for sudden drops or lingering darkness.
AE.AE_Impact_Blur_To_Color: Blurs the image completely into a solid color before resolving into the new clip.
AE.AE_Impact_Dip_To_White: A customizable flash-to-white, useful for fashion, music videos, or flashbacks.
AE.AE_Impact_Directional_Blur: Streaks the image in a specific direction (up, down, left, right) to simulate fast motion.
AE.AE_Impact_Earthquake: Violently shakes the camera frame, simulating an impact, explosion, or seismic event.
AE.Impact_Film_Dissolve: Emulates the exposure characteristics of analog film stock for a cinematic blending of scenes.
AE.AE_Impact_Film_Roll: Simulates a film projector slipping vertically, rolling the frame up or down.
AE.AE_Impact_Flare: Transitions using a bright, anamorphic or spherical lens flare that washes over the screen.
AE.AE_Impact_Flash: A sudden, intense burst of light, brighter and sharper than a standard dip-to-white.
AE.AE_Impact_Flicker: Rapidly toggles brightness or opacity, simulating a strobing light or broken projector.
AE.AE_Impact_Fold: The image folds in on itself like a piece of paper or origami.
AE.AE_Impact_Frame: Dynamic framing elements slide in or out to transition the scene.
AE.AE_Impact_Glass: Distorts the image as if viewed through moving, refracting glass or crystal.
AE.AE_Impact_Glitch: Simulates digital data corruption, pixel sorting, and compression errors for a sci-fi or tech-fail vibe.
AE.AE_Impact_Glow: The highlights of the image bloom and glow intensely to transition to the next shot.
AE.AE_Impact_Grunge: Adds dirt, scratches, and texture to the transition for a gritty, urban, or industrial look.
AE.AE_Impact_Kaleido: Reflects the image into a symmetrical, kaleidoscopic pattern.
AE.AE_Impact_Lens_Blur: Simulates a camera racking focus, blurring the background to bokeh before sharpening on the new clip.
AE.AE_Impact_Light_Leaks: Adds organic, moving patches of colored light, simulating light hitting the camera sensor.
AE.AE_Impact_Light_Sweep: A beam of light sweeps across the frame, wiping the new image on.
AE.AE_Impact_Linear_Wipe: A clean, smooth wipe with soft edges, often used for professional presentations.
AE.AE_Impact_Liquid_Distortion: Warps the image as if it were a fluid, creating a melting or underwater transition effect.
AE.AE_Impact_Luma_Fade: Transitions based on the brightness of the image pixels, with brights or darks fading first.
AE.AE_Impact_Mirror: Splits and reflects the screen to reveal the next shot.
AE.AE_Impact_Mosaic: Pixelates the image into large blocks that resolve into the new clip.
AE.AE_Impact_Warp: Bends and twists the image geometry to pull the viewer into the next scene.
AE.AE_Impact_Animate: Uses animation curves to move elements of the clip during the transition.
AE.AE_Impact_Copy_Machine: Simulates the scanning light of a photocopier passing over the image.
AE.AE_Impact_Page_Peel: A high-quality 3D page turn effect with lighting and shadow controls.
AE.AE_Impact_PanelWipe: Multiple panels slide across the screen to replace the image.
AE.AE_Impact_Phosphore: Simulates the delay and glow of an old CRT monitor or phosphor screen.
AE.AE_Impact_Plateau_Wipe: A wipe that uses a gradient map to create a stepped or plateaued reveal.
AE.AE_Impact_Pop: The new clip pops onto the screen with a slight bounce or elastic scale effect.
AE.AE_Impact_Pull: Pulls the outgoing clip backward into Z-space to reveal the new clip.
AE.AE_Impact_Push: Pushes the old clip out of the way using the new clip, with added motion blur.
AE.AE_Impact_Radial_Blur: Apply a strong spinning blur to the transition point.
AE.Impact_Radial_Wipe: A circular wipe with customizable feathering and center points.
AE.AE_Impact_Rays: God-rays or volumetric light beams shoot out from the image highlights.
AE.AE_Impact_Roll: Rolls the image continuously in a direction, creating a conveyor belt effect.
AE.AE_Impact_Shape_Flow: Morphs the image using geometric shapes that flow into one another.
AE.AE_Impact_Slice: Slices the image into strips that slide apart.
AE.AE_Impact_Solarize: Inverts color and luminance values briefly, creating a trippy, photographic negative look.
AE.AE_Impact_Spin: Rapidly spins the camera 360 degrees to land on the new clip.
AE.AE_Impact_Split: Splits the image and separates the pieces to show the underlying layer.
AE.AE_Impact_Spring: A transition with elastic, bouncy movement physics.
AE.AE_Impact_Star_Wipe: A retro wipe using a star shape.
AE.AE_Impact_Stretch_Wipe: Stretches the pixels at the edge of the wipe, creating a smear effect.
AE.AE_Impact_Stretch: Distorts and pulls the image horizontally or vertically like rubber.
AE.AE_Impact_Stripes: Overlays animating stripes that reveal the second clip.
AE.AE_Impact_TV_Power: Simulates an old television set turning off, shrinking the image to a dot.
AE.AE_Impact_Text_Animator: Transitions designed to work specifically with text overlays.
AE.AE_Impact_Typewriter: Reveals elements sequentially, similar to typing.
AE.AE_Impact_VHS_Damage: Adds tracking errors, static, and color bleeding to mimic a broken VCR tape.
AE.AE_Impact_Wave: Ripples the image like a stone thrown into a pond.
AE.Impact_Whip: A high-velocity lateral blur that mimics a fast camera pan.
AE.AE_Impact_Wipe: A standard wipe improved with better edge softness and angle controls.
AE.AE_Impact_Zoom_Blur: Blurs the edges of the frame outward, simulating a rapid speed change.
